name: patient_management_system
description: Patient Management System - React Frontend + NestJS Backend + Prisma

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.clean: (rmdir /s /q node_modules 2>nul || rm -rf node_modules 2>/dev/null || echo ok) && cd server && (rmdir /s /q node_modules dist 2>nul || rm -rf node_modules dist 2>/dev/null || echo ok) && cd ../client && (rmdir /s /q node_modules dist 2>nul || rm -rf node_modules dist 2>/dev/null || echo ok)
scripts.lint: cd server && npm run lint && cd ../client && npm run lint
scripts.db:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: cd server && npx prisma migrate reset
